name: Pringo
overview: Pringo offers software products that combine enterprise class portals, content management system, social collaboration features, and user management tools, in one open-source package.

milestones.description: Pringo Adds Micro-Blogging to Social Networking Solutions
milestones.source_text:
Pringo Adds Micro-Blogging to Social Networking Solutions


More News related to Press Releases

    * CFIA/Warning: Allergy Alert-Undeclared Milk in Coboss Brand No Sugar Added Dark Chocolate
    * IAU Names Asteroid 168126 "Chengbruce" after Taiwanese Entrepreneur Bruce C.H. Cheng
    * Samsung MLC-based 128GB is Now in Volume Production
    * CHC Announces Extension of Cash Tender Offer & Related Consent Solicitation for All of Its Outstanding 7 3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes Due 2014 & Timing Update for Acquisition by First Reserv
    * CHC Announces Extension of Cash Tender Offer & Related Consent Solicitation for All of Its Outstanding 7 3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes Due 2014 & Timing Update for Acquisition by First Reserv

More News related to Press Releases
July 8, 2008 2:54 PM EDT

LOS ANGELES, CA -- (MARKET WIRE) -- 07/08/08 -- Pringo, the leader in empowering online communities, has announced that the latest versions of its social networking solutions will include micro-blogging features. This marks the first white label social networking platform which allows customers to employ Twitter-like functionality.

Micro-blogging merges the one-to-many broadcast model of blogging with an immersive network model of a social network. For marketers it acts as a direct channel to potential customers and also acts as a channel for feedback.

Pringo will demonstrate its platform at the Social Networking Conference in San Francisco, July 10 and 11, at the Mission Bay Conference Center.

"As online marketing shifts toward branded content, micro-blogging is a powerful new way of making sure it is seen," said Majid Abai, Pringo CEO. "It's a great distribution channel for both marketers and media owners and we've responded quickly to customer feedback that this is an essential requirement for their online communities."

Pringo CEO Majid Abai is also a speaker at the Social Networking Conference. The topic of his panel session is 'Software & Social Platforms Delivering Web 2.0 Next Generation Portals to the Enterprise'. Abai will discuss the critical steps and criteria for enterprises to choose the right social computing platforms. The panel takes place at 11:00am on Friday, July 11, as part of track A.

About Pringo

Pringo is the leading provider of white-label online community platforms. Its products help organizations in any industry build integrated online communities, boosting Web site stickiness, increasing customer and brand loyalty, ultimately driving sales and growing revenues. The Pringo solution is an essential component of any organization's sales, marketing and internal and external communications strategies. Pringo is privately funded and is based in Los Angeles, CA. For more information, please visit www.pringo.com.
milestones.source_description: Pringo Adds Micro-Blogging to Social Networking Solutions

milestones.description: Revenues for Pringo Nearly Double the First Half of 2008
milestones.source_text:
LOS ANGELES, CA, Jul 14, 2008 (MARKET WIRE via COMTEX) -- Pringo, the leader in empowering online communities, has doubled its growth in the first half of this year, compared to the entire 2007 calendar year, increasing revenues almost 200% in the period January to June 2008.
The company, which specializes in building social networking platforms and online communities for organizations, now has a customer base of 80 clients, in a variety of industry sectors including music, media and entertainment.
With a staff of 35 in West Los Angeles, Pringo is looking to hire another 10 employees immediately in the areas of engineering, design and business development. Headcount is expected to be at least 50 by the end of 2008.
"The business has shown excellent growth in the first six months of 2008 and we expect that trend to continue well into 2009," said Majid Abai, CEO of Pringo. "Online communities are essential toolsets of an enterprise enabling higher customer loyalty strategies, better intranets, and offer more collaboration amongst vendors and partners. There is great demand for our social networking solutions and we'll be expanding the business domestically and internationally accordingly to meet our customers' needs."
Pringo will demonstrate the latest version of its products at the Web 2.0 Expo in New York, September 16-19. To arrange a demo at Web 2.0, please email pringo@lewispr.com.
About Pringo
Pringo is the leading provider of white-label online community platforms. Its products help organizations in any industry build integrated online communities, boosting Web site stickiness, increasing customer and brand loyalty, ultimately driving sales and growing revenues. The Pringo solution is an essential component of any organization's sales, marketing and internal and external communications strategies. Pringo is privately funded and is based in Los Angeles, CA. For more information, please visit www.pringo.com.
milestones.source_description: Pringo Grows Due to Rising Consumer Brand Demand for Online Communities

milestones.description: Pringo launches v3.0 beta at Web 2.0 Expo
milestones.source_text:
Pringo Launches v3.0 at Web 2.0 Expo

New online community platform provides increased flexibility
and enterprise social networking capabilities

Los Angeles, CA â€“ September 16, 2008 â€“ Pringo, a leader in empowering online communities, today launched the beta version of Pringo 3.0, the first
non-hosted social networking platform to provide enterprises the flexibility to integrate with preferred applications or data.

With Pringo v3.0, organizations can integrate any software, such as a blog, bulletin board or shopping cart, into the Pringo platform using its new extension architecture. For example, if an organization prefers to use vBulletinÂ® instead of Pringo's proprietary Bulletin Board, it can swap one out for the other and integrate directly into the Pringo platform. Synchronization is simple and the process works seamlessly.

An additional element of Pringo v3.0 is its intranet solution, which enhances collaboration amongst co-workers in local and distributed environments and enables organizations to use technology to improve personnel productivity. Utilizing this solution, organizations can create subject- and geographically-based groups to seamlessly work on a project. In addition, Pringo's intranet solution provides improved training capabilities and also allows companies to more easily communicate focused messaging to their employees.

"We continue to see extremely high demand for our community platform, and with v3.0 we are providing our customers with further flexibility and an intranet solution to complement their internal operations," said Majid Abai, CEO of Pringo. "Enterprises can now use whichever applications they are most comfortable with, while relying on a single platform to streamline their external and internal communications."

Additional features of Pringo v3.0 include:
- Integration with Google Apps, providing immediate intranet capabilities for organizations which utilize Google Apps combined with the power of Pringo's Web 2.0 platform
- Increased security, including digital signatures, encryption and
privacy settings
- Integration with Docstoc, a document management platform that enables flash presentation of all file types
- Integration with QuoteMedia, which will provide real-time trading information to Pringo's customers

Pringo will demonstrate its new platform at the Web 2.0 Expo in booth #1919, September 17-18, 2008 at the Javits Center in New York. To schedule a meeting at Web 2.0, please email pringo@lewispr.com.

About Pringo
Pringo is the leading provider of non-hosted online community platforms. Its products help organizations in any industry build integrated online communities, boosting brand awareness and Web site stickiness, increasing customer and brand loyalty, ultimately driving sales and growing revenues. The Pringo platform is an essential component of any organization's sales, marketing and internal and external communications strategies. Pringo is privately funded and is based in Los Angeles, CA. For more information, please visit www.pringo.com.
milestones.source_description: Pringo launches v3.0 beta at Web 2.0 Expo

milestones.description: Pringo introduces v4 of its platform: Portals, social collaboration, and CMS all in one open-source format.
